Annotations.content: Validation here is "nice to have", so we'll still continue with the payment if something fails.
Validation here is "nice to have", so we'll still continue with the payment if something fails.

Metadata.name: C3 Agent-Assisted Payment IVR
Metadata.description: Flow for collecting payments with C3 through a quick connect IVR.

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was an error creating the payment request.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There's no payment information for this customer. Please fill out the information in the C3 Payment Request app and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was an error placing the agent on hold. Unable to request payment.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
To ensure the security of your information, the agent has been temporarily placed on hold.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
A payment has been requested for the amount of $$.Attributes.PaymentAmount.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
You previously paid with a bank account ending in <say-as interpret-as="digits">$.Attributes.PaymentMethodEndingDigits</say-as>.

If you would like to use this account again for this payment, press 1.
To use a different payment method, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
You previously paid with a credit or debit card ending in <say-as interpret-as="digits">$.Attributes.PaymentMethodEndingDigits</say-as>.

If you would like to use this card again for this payment, press 1.
To use a different payment method, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
To pay with a credit or debit card, press 1.
To pay directly with your bank account, press 2.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Your entry was not recognized. Please try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was a problem with your routing number. Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Please enter your bank's routing number, followed by the pound key when complete.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Please enter your card number followed by the pound key when complete.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Please enter your bank account number followed by the pound key when complete.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
We're sorry, an error has occured preventing us from submitting your payment. You have not been charged.
</prosody>
</speak>

Transitions.NextAction: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Errors.NextAction: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Actions.Identifier: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was a problem validating your $.Attributes.PaymentMethod information.
</prosody>
</speak>

Transitions.NextAction: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Errors.NextAction: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Your payment was processed successfully.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was a problem with your expiration date. Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

Transitions.NextAction: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Errors.NextAction: Remove Failed Payment Token and Method

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
The payment failed because of the following error:

$.External.Error
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
A receipt has been sent to your email address, $.Attributes.['Email'].
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
There was an error sending the receipt to your email address, $.Attributes.['Email']. Please contact customer support to receive a receipt for this transaction.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
We're sorry, an error has occurred that prevents us from collecting the payment.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Returning you to the agent...
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
$.External.ValidationError

Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

Actions.Identifier: Check for Card Number Validation Error

Transitions.NextAction: Check for Card Number Validation Error

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
$.External.ValidationError

Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

Actions.Identifier: Check for Account Number Validation Error

Transitions.NextAction: Check for Account Number Validation Error

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
$.External.ValidationError

Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

Actions.Identifier: Check for Routing Number Validation Error

Transitions.NextAction: Check for Routing Number Validation Error

Parameters.Text:
<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Are you still there?
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
Please enter your card's expiration date in the format month-month-year-year, followed by the pound key when complete.
</prosody>
</speak>

<speak>
<prosody volume="<<speakingVolume>>" rate="<<speakingRate>>">
$.External.ValidationError

Please check your entry and try again.
</prosody>
</speak>

Actions.Identifier: Check for Expiration Date Validation Error

Transitions.NextAction: Check for Expiration Date Validation Error
